builds.title: Reload config
builds.description: If your username or password is null, you can no press Reload Config to fetch Bugzilla Live configuration, without needing to restart the application.

builds.title: Fixes
builds.description: Authentication errors are now shown in the GUI if there is a problem when trying to get ORs.*Changing themes are now saved so your theme is saved when opening Bugzilla again.*The URL for Bugzilla is now retrieved from the config service, so it can be changed in the application.properties file without having to rebuild and redeploy Bugzilla Live.

builds.title: Themes
builds.description: You can now change the colours of the information pane texts as well as the background.*The help menu will now open in the Wiki.*You can now customise Bugzilla Live from a set of pre-built themes.

builds.title: Bugs and performance
builds.description: Performance improvements.

builds.title: New application bar
builds.description: The main toolbar at the top of Bugzilla Live is now colour customisable.

builds.title: New clipboard copies
builds.description: Generating a unit test now automatically copies the unit test file name to the clipboard.*Copy the title of an OR by right clicking on an OR and choosing to copy the title.

builds.title: Coded ORs
builds.description: Changing the status of an OR to coded will automatically change the comment to the Coded template.

builds.title: OR management
builds.description: You can now add a comment to an OR from within the application.*You can now change the status of an OR from within the application.*The OR micro service for Bugzilla Live has been converted to Python.

builds.title: New font
builds.description: Code updates and a new font for Bugzilla Live.

builds.title: OR table filers & pause refreshing
builds.description: You can now type text into the filter field, and the table will auto filter ORs to match the filter.*Refreshing can now be paused.

builds.title: Process improvements & new About dialog
builds.description: Changed the layout of the About dialog.*Fixed an issue where some requests would return a 'null' error.

builds.title: Fixes for getting ORs and colour improvements
builds.description: Fixed an issue where selecting 'Get My ORs' would not get new ORs assigned to you after pressing the refresh button.*Fixed an issue where changing the colour for any part of the application would turn some ORs pink.

builds.title: External lists fixes
builds.description: Fixed an issue where you could not view an external list and instead got an exception.

builds.title: Subsystem tests
builds.description: You can now create subsystem test documents (currently only for CRM) from one or more ORs in the table.

builds.title: Unit tests & release notes
builds.description: You can now create unit test documents from an OR in the table.*You can now create release notes (currently only CRM) from one or more ORs in the table.*Fixed an issue where adding or removing an OR from a list would cause an error.*Fixed an issue where creating a new OR list would cause an error.

builds.title: Custom colours
builds.description: Added a colour chooser to define your own colours for window bars and OR colours.*Added theme icon for colour choose option.*Updated shortcut to use correct icon file.

builds.title: GUI updates & new shortcut
builds.description: Added cancel buttons to popup windows.*Re-skinned application to use custom tool bars.*Updated shortcut so that application is always run in administrator mode.

builds.title: New GUI
builds.description: Redesigned the entire application.

builds.title: Small fixes
builds.description: Windows such as the 'Add OR' and 'Create List' display relevant icons.*The correct title is displayed in the information pane when changing from ORs in a list to user ORs.

builds.title: New icons
builds.description: Updated all the icons used by Bugzilla Live.

builds.title: GUI updates & improvements
builds.description: Added 'About' to see the latest release information on Bugzilla LIVE.*Moved 'Get My ORs' and 'Get User ORs' into the same section.*Navbar Search and Firefox now use just icons.*The OR table can now be copied to the clipboard.*Fixed an issue with the list response message.*Added 'Last Updated' to the sort menu, and some fields now sort in a certain order, for example 'Severity' ascending is sorted Investigation, Diagnosed... instead of alphabetical.*OR comments now display the number in the dialog name.*The Information Pane wraps the text, so the file name can be seen if it is long.*Unrecognised file types now shown 'Unknown File Type' instead of 'null'.*OR service no longer fails if no ORs are retrieved.*Choosing to 'Get My ORs' now refreshes in such a way so that new ORs assigned to you are automatically displayed on the next refresh of your ORs.

builds.title: External lists + excel exports
builds.description: Added comment icon for the context menu.*You can now export the OR table to an excel spreadsheet using 'File->Export to Excel'.*External lists now refresh properly and will pick up changes made by other people.

builds.title: OR comments
builds.description: Comments encode correctly and longer show symbols instead of punctuation.*'Last Updated' column now shows 24-hour clock.

builds.title: Refreshing tables
builds.description: Table now refreshes when creating a new list.*Table shows a 'Please Wait' message when changing source of ORs.*Message boxes are shown if a microservice reports a failure.*Comments and attachments for ORs now available.
